backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, Instagram credential validation, automation settings, and reply logs with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark theme tokens and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app with a root div and module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile initialization, dark theme, and routing between pages.
Logout button clearing Internet Identity session and query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for new users to create a basic profile with a name field.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorCall: Reusable error alert component for inline error messages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Automa: UI for fetching, editing, and saving keyword-based automation settings.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Compli: Notice explaining Instagram API compliance requirements and supported account types.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Instag: React form to view and validate Instagram credentials, showing connection status and handling validation via mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LogsSe: Displays filtered reply logs with loading states, empty states, and a selectable status filter.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Renders the dashboard header with logo and authentication button.
Provides page layout with header, main content area, and footer including branding link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, Instagram credentials, automation settings, and reply logs using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for theme colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Assembles the dashboard view including compliance notice, Instagram connection, automation settings, and logs.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React landing page showing branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity login buttons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture, requirements, and implemented features for ReelReply.
